question: Which among the following statements is correct about Fissure vents?
option1: It is an isolated, flat-topped underwater volcano mountain
option2: It is an area of land surrounded by one or more younger lava flows
option3: It is the linear volcanic vent through which lava erupts
option4: It is a molten lava contained in a volcanic crater
answer: It is the linear volcanic vent through which lava erupts
explanation: Fissure vent is the linear volcanic vent through which lava erupts.Â  It is also known as volcanic fissure or eruption fissure. They are usually found along rifts and rift zones.
